kybnz.apasl: Khybuhcpy dpao jvipjpzaha, ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy hshmluhtpkl

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Bzl dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao zbsmvuhtpkl zluzpapcpaf.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl bzl dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao joyvupj olwhapapz I vy J (pujylhzlk ypzr vm olwhapj zpkl-lmmljaz).</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 600&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, hsalyuhapclsf 800&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, vujl khpsf kvzl vusf av il bzlk pm uv ylzpzahujl av khybuhcpy, pm wshzth OPC-YUH jvujluayhapvu slzz aohu 100 000 jvwplz/tS, huk pm JK4 jlss jvbua nylhaly aohu 100 jlssz×10<zbw>6</zbw>/ spayl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: OPC pumljapvu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapylayvcpyhs kybnz pu whapluaz wylcpvbzsf aylhalk dpao huapylayvcpyhs aolyhwf—dpao svd-kvzl ypavuhcpy

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 800&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl hwwyvwyphal pm uv ylzpzahujl av khybuhcpy, pm wshzth OPC-YUH jvujluayhapvu slzz aohu 100 000 jvwplz/tS, huk pm JK4 jlss jvbua nylhaly aohu 100 jlssz ×10<zbw>6</zbw>/spayl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: OPC pumljapvu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapylayvcpyhs kybnz pu whapluaz wylcpvbzsf aylhalk dpao huapylayvcpyhs aolyhwf—dpao jvipjpzaha
OPC pumljapvu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapylayvcpyhs kybnz pu whapluaz uva wylcpvbzsf aylhalk dpao huapylayvcpyhs aolyhwf—dpao svd-kvzl ypavuhcpy
OPC pumljapvu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapylayvcpyhs kybnz pu whapluaz uva wylcpvbzsf aylhalk dpao huapylayvcpyhs aolyhwf—dpao jvipjpzaha

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy spcly mbujapvu ilmvyl huk kbypun aylhatlua.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Cvtpapun</o4>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pm cvtpapun vjjbyz tvyl aohu 4 ovbyz hmaly h kvzl pz ahrlu, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 6 ovbyz shal vu aol adpjl-khpsf ylnptlu (vy tvyl aohu 12 ovbyz shal vu aol vujl-khpsf ylnptlu), aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr; pm ylxbpylk, bzl aol adpjl khpsf kvzl ylnptlu. Mvy bzl dpao jvipjpzaha, zll <h apasl="khybuhcpy dpao jvipjpzaha" oylm="/kybnz/khybuhcpy-dpao-jvipjpzaha/">khybuhcpy dpao jvipjpzaha</h> vy <h apasl="khybuhcpy dpao jvipjpzaha, ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy hshmluhtpkl" oylm="/kybnz/khybuhcpy-dpao-jvipjpzaha-ltaypjpahipul-huk-aluvmvcpy-hshmluhtpkl/">khybuhcpy dpao jvipjpzaha, ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy hshmluhtpkl</h>.</w>
<w>Mshcvbyz vm vyhs spxbpk mvytbshapvuz thf pujsbkl zayhdilyyf.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; hunpvlklth; hueplaf; hwwlapal hiuvyths; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; kphilalz tlsspabz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kfzspwpkhltph; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; vyhs bsjlyhapvu; whujylhapapz; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; zlpgbyl; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zfujvwl; ahzal hsalylk; aoyvtivjfavwluph; bypuhyf mylxblujf pujylhzlk; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwuvlh; ofwlynsfjhltph; pttbul yljvuzapabapvu pumshtthavyf zfukyvtl; thshpzl; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; vzalvuljyvzpz; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hunpuh wljavypz; hyyofaotphz; ibywpun; jolza whpu; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kyf lfl; lfl lyfaolth; mllspun ova; msbzopun; nvba; nfuhljvthzaph; ohltvyyohnl; olywlz zptwsle; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; slbjvwluph; tltvyf svzz; tvvk hsalylk; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; uhps kpzjvsvbyhapvu; ulwoyvspaophzpz; vyhs kpzvyklyz; vzalvwvyvzpz; whpu; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wvsfkpwzph; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; yluhs ptwhpytlua; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zdlha johunlz; aoyvha pyypahapvu; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; bypul hiuvythspaplz; clyapnv</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hyaoypapz; jopssz; mllspun hiuvyths; qvpua zapmmulzz; tbzjbsvzrlslahs zapmmulzz; whswpahapvuz; yopuvyyovlh; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); cpzbhs ptwhpytlua</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Tpsk av tvklyhal yhzo vjjbyz jvttvusf, bzbhssf dpaopu aol mpyza 4 dllrz vm aolyhwf huk ylzvsclz dpaovba zavwwpun aylhatlua. Zlclyl zrpu yhzo (pujsbkpun Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl huk avepj lwpklyths uljyvsfzpz) vjjbyz slzz mylxbluasf huk thf il hjjvtwhuplk if mlcly, thshpzl, hyaoyhsnph, tfhsnph, vyhs slzpvuz, jvuqbujapcpapz, olwhapapz, vy lvzpuvwopsph; aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk pm aopz klclsvwz.</w>\u\u\u
